jd: From: Anil, Cygnus anil.s@cygnuspro.com Reply to: anil.s@cygnuspro.com Hi ,Good Morning!This is Anil and I am sr. Recruiter at Cygnus Pro. I am reaching out to you on below Exciting Job Opportunity with our clients. please reach us with updated resume and details if the job looks suitable to you. Role: Business Analyst (Performance Measurement & Attribution) - #JC2129485Work Location: Quincy, MA (Hybrid) Job Description:Investment Performance Measurement domain knowledge; Business Analyst or Product roles, fairly standard set of skills - accounting data ingestion, calculations, reporting etc. if possible with existing STT PnA / FLX / GPA experience.”Apply functional business knowledge when building platform requirementsAbility to perform gap analysis between source of data and existing data model to determine model additionsEffective communicator – can summarize succinctly and can provide details when needed.Team oriented – capable of working in a global setting.Detail oriented and strong sense of responsibility.Flexible and can adapt easily to changing/evolving role requirementsStrong critical thinking and problem-solving skills Best Regards,Anil Reddy | Sr. Technical RecruiterT: 732 485 0000 x 9049.
